title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 201 - Permits And Registrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 201 - Permits And Registrations

State Regulations

Subpart 201-1 - GENERAL PROVISIONS (§ 201-1.1 to 201-1.16)

Subpart 201-2 - DEFINITIONS (§ 201-2.1)

Subpart 201-3 - PERMIT EXEMPT AND TRIVIAL ACTIVITIES (§ 201-3.1 to 201-3.3)

Subpart 201-4 - MINOR FACILITY REGISTRATION (§ 201-4.1 to 201-4.5)

Subpart 201-5 - STATE FACILITY PERMITS (§ 201-5.1 to 201-5.4)

Subpart 201-6 - TITLE V FACILITY PERMITS (§ 201-6.1 to 201-6.9)

Subpart 201-7 - FEDERALLY ENFORCEABLE EMISSION CAPS (§ 201-7.1 to 201-7.3)

Subpart 201-8 - GENERAL PERMITS (§ 201-8.1 to 201-8.3)

Subpart 201-9 - TABLES (§ 201-9.1)

Subpart 201-10 - SEVERABILITY (§ 201-10.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 201

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/24/2021

Statutory Authority: Environmental Conservation Law

Sections 1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0302, 19-0303, 19-03 05, 19-0311, 70-0109, 71-2103, 7 1 - 21 05 and Sections 501-507 of the Clean Air

Act

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
